text: 19:5 Ofa Gami 18:21Egha me Jerusalemɨn asem Balɨn ziam fasa danganibar ingarigha, uari uan boriba isa ofan bar isia mɨghɨribar mɨn, avimɨn da tua asem Bal bagha ofa gami. Arazir ia amizir kam a nan arazim puvatɨ. Kɨ kamaghɨn arazir kam damuasa me mɨkemezir puvatɨ. Bar puvatɨ. Egha uaghan arazir kamagh garir tam kɨ me danɨngasa nɨghnɨzir puvatɨ.
